::DeviLDuer::

DevilDuer shruggs, putting the chip into the machine, scan reports 
showing up on the unbroken screen, the other being shattered from 
Vamprah's screen.

"Won't change much if he does know," he says, "Its stupid to attack a 
base, and once we get that femm revived, we can get her t' tell us 
who the bot is."

He looks back out the door, looking at the rest of Vamprah's 
necklace. "But we probably should see what's up with the rest of that 
thing."

He walks past Diamond, stopping when he remembers that he still had 
her dagger.

"Oh, and here's yer knife," he says, handing it back to her, "Thanx 
for lettin' me use it."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She followed him. "If the chip is a mind controlling chip, then 
what 
> about the rest of the necklace? And could there be other chips in 
the 
> necklace?" She looked at Devilduer,"Also, who was the one who 
> controlled the mind controlling chip in the first place? won't that 
> bot know that the connection had been broken?"
